t: Luke 16
And*p he said also unto his disciples, There*r was*r a*r certain*r rich*r man,*r which*r had*r a*r steward;*r and*r the*r same*r was*r accused*r unto*r him*r that*r he*r had*r wasted*r his*r goods.*r

Then*rp said*r he*r to*r another,*r And*r how*r much*r owest*r thou?*r And*r he*r said,*r An*r hundred*r measures*r of*r wheat.*r And*r he*r said*r unto*r him,*r Take*r thy*r bill,*r and*r write*r fourscore.*r

And*rp the*r lord*r commended*r the*r unjust*r steward,*r because*r he*r had*r done*r wisely:*r for*r the*r children*r of*r this*r world*r are*r in*r their*r generation*r wiser*r than*r the*r children*r of*r light.*r

And*p he said unto them, Ye*r are*r they*r which*r justify*r yourselves*r before*r men;*r but*r God*r knoweth*r your*r hearts:*r for*r that*r which*r is*r highly*r esteemed*r among*r men*r is*r abomination*r in*r the*r sight*r of*r God.*r
The*rp law*r and*r the*r prophets*r were*r until*r John:*r since*r that*r time*r the*r kingdom*r of*r God*r is*r preached,*r and*r every*r man*r presseth*r into*r it.*r
And*rp it*r is*r easier*r for*r heaven*r and*r earth*r to*r pass,*r than*r one*r tittle*r of*r the*r law*r to*r fail.*r

Whosoever*rp putteth*r away*r his*r wife,*r and*r marrieth*r another,*r committeth*r adultery:*r and*r whosoever*r marrieth*r her*r that*r is*r put*r away*r from*r her*r husband*r committeth*r adultery.*r
There*rp was*r a*r certain*r rich*r man,*r which*r was*r clothed*r in*r purple*r and*r fine*r linen,*r and*r fared*r sumptuously*r every*r day:*r

And*rp it*r came*r to*r pass,*r that*r the*r beggar*r died,*r and*r was*r carried*r by*r the*r angels*r into*r Abraham's*r bosom:*r the*r rich*r man*r also*r died,*r and*r was*r buried;*r

But*rp Abraham*r said,*r Son,*r remember*r that*r thou*r in*r thy*r lifetime*r receivedst*r thy*r good*r things,*r and*r likewise*r Lazarus*r evil*r things:*r but*r now*r he*r is*r comforted,*r and*r thou*r art*r tormented.*r
